power.title: Grave Spikes
power.fluff: As you strike your foe, your weapon shoots hundreds of tiny shadow spikes into it, wracking it with pain

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is wracked with pain (save ends).
While it is wracked with pain, the target takes ongoing 5 damage and falls prone each time it takes this damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the target while your shrouds are on it.

power.title: Strangling Shadow
power.fluff: Your attack distracts your foe with pain just long enough for you to weave a noose of shadows around its neck

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is strangled by a shadow noose (save ends).
While strangled, the target takes ongoing 5 damage and is immobilized.

If the target is pushed, pulled or slid more than 1 square while it is strangled by the noose, it takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus. The target can take this damage only once per turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).

section.name: Effect:
section.text: While the target is immobilized by this power, you can use the following action once on each of your turns:

section.name: Free Action:
section.text: You pull the target a number of squares equal to 1 + the number of your shrouds on it.

power.title: Targeted For Death
power.fluff: A black dart streaks from your hand to strike the target, surroinding it in a warmth-stealing gloom

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have the assassin's shroud class power.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d8 + Dexterity modifier cold damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you use your assassin's shroud class power against the target, you place two of your shrouds on it instead of one.

power.title: Terrifying Visage
power.fluff: Your face distorts into a horrid visage, which drives your foes before you, except for one victim that is rooted in place

section.name: Primary Target:
section.text: One creature adjacent to you in the blast

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier psychic damage, and the primary target is immobilized (save ends) or until the end of your next turn, whichever lasts longer.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the primary target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Secondary Target:
section.text: Each creature other than the primary target in the blast

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: You push the secondary target 4 squares.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You push the secondary target 2 squares.
